      <div id="plcPrivacyPopup" style="display: none">
       <!-- NOTE: Only render to page if cookie flag doesn't exist.  Except for CSS, this snippet is entirely self-contained.  On button click, data in the ajax data property below will be sent to the endpoint in the ajax url property. -->
       <div class="cookie-message" style="z-index: 100;">
        <h2 class="cookie-message__title">
         PLEASE REVIEW OUR UPDATED PRIVACY &amp; COOKIES NOTICE
        </h2>
        <div class="cookie-messages__body">
         This site uses cookies and similar technologies to store information on your computer or device. By continuing to use this site, you agree to the placement of these cookies and similar technologies. Read our updated
         <a href="https://www.gatesfoundation.org/Privacy-and-Cookies-Notice" target="_blank">
          Privacy &amp; Cookies Notice
         </a>
         to learn more.
        </div>
        <button class="btn cookie-message__button" id="js-cooking-message-accept">
         I AGREE
        </button>
       </div>
      </div>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       jQuery(document).ready(function () { 
        checkCookie();
        jQuery("#js-cooking-message-accept").on("click", function () {
            setCookie("PrivacyPolicy", "true", 365);
            jQuery(this).closest(".cookie-message").css("display", "none");
        });
    });

    function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
        var d = new Date();
        d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
        var expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
        document.cookie = cname + "=" + "true" + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
    }

    function getCookie(cname) {
        var name = cname + "=";
        var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
        for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
            var c = ca[i];
            while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
                c = c.substring(1);
            }
            if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
                return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
            }
        }
        return "";
    }

    function checkCookie() {
        var cookieExist = getCookie("PrivacyPolicy");
        if (cookieExist == "") {
            jQuery("#plcPrivacyPopup").css("display", "block");
        }
    }
      </script>

        <h4>

      <section class="mission">
       <h6>
        our missions to Achieve our vision
       </h6>
       <div class="divider divider--heading">
        <span class="divider__line">
        </span>
        <span class="divider__arrow divider__arrow--down">
        </span>
        <span class="divider__line">
        </span>
       </div>
       <article class="mission-content" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_1_MissionArticle">
        <img alt="Background placeholder" class="circle--background__mobile" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_1_BackgroundMobile" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" style="background-color:#eb9700;"/>
        <div class="circle--background" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_1_Background" style="background-color:#eb9700;">
        </div>
        <img alt="Ensuring more young people survive and thrive" class="mission-content__person mission-content__person--animation" src="/~/media/GFO/Home/article1person.png?h=798&amp;la=en&amp;w=449"/>
        <div class="mission-content__title--animation">
         <div class="mission-content__title-holder js-mission-content__title-holder">
          <h2 class="invert" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_1_HeaderTitlePart1">
           Ensure more children
           <br/>
           and young people
           <br/>
          </h2>
          <h4 class="invert" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_1_HeaderTitlePart2" style="border-color:#eb9700;">
           Survive And
           <br/>
           Thrive
          </h4>
         </div>
        </div>
        <img alt="Ensuring more young people survive and thrive" class="mission-content__image mission-content__image--animation" src="/~/media/GFO/Home/article1.jpg?h=380&amp;la=en&amp;w=676"/>
        <div class="mission-content__description mission-content__description--animation">
         <h3>
          we believe
         </h3>
         <div class="divider divider--mission">
          <span class="divider__line--left" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_1_Divider1" style="border-color:#eb9700;">
          </span>
          <span class="divider__arrow divider__arrow--up" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_1_Divider2" style="border-color:#eb9700;">
          </span>
          <span class="divider__line--right" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_1_Divider3" style="border-color:#eb9700;">
          </span>
         </div>
         <strong id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_1_Subtitle2Tag" style="color:#eb9700;">
          the path out of poverty begins when the next generation can access quality healthcare and a great education.
         </strong>
         <p>
          In developing countries, we focus on improving people’s health and wellbeing, helping individuals lift themselves out of hunger and extreme poverty. In the United States, we seek to ensure that all people—especially those with the fewest resources—can
 access the opportunities they need to succeed in school and life.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="mission-content__navigation has-person">
         <strong id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_1_LinksHeaderTag" style="background-color:#eb9700;">
          A closer Look
         </strong>
         <ul class="mission-content__navigation-links">
          <li>
           <a class="link-text omni-link-tracker" href="/What-We-Do/US-Program/K-12-Education" omni-events="" omni-title="Content For: " omni-values="eVar16=" omni-vars="eVar16" title="Enhance education through innovation">
            Enhance education through innovation
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a class="link-text omni-link-tracker" href="/What-We-Do/Global-Development/Nutrition" omni-events="" omni-title="Content For: " omni-values="eVar16=" omni-vars="eVar16" title="Improve nutrition to reduce child deaths">
            Improve nutrition to reduce child deaths
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a class="link-text omni-link-tracker" href="/What-We-Do/Global-Development/Maternal-Newborn-and-Child-Health" omni-events="" omni-title="Content For: " omni-values="eVar16=" omni-vars="eVar16" target="_blank">
            Invest in healthy mothers and babies
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a class="link-text omni-link-tracker" href="/What-We-Do/US-Program/Washington-State" omni-events="" omni-title="Content For: " omni-values="eVar16=" omni-vars="eVar16" target="_blank">
            Tackle poverty in WA state
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </article>
      </section>
      <section class="mission">
       <article class="mission-content mission-content--right" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_2_MissionArticle">
        <img alt="Background placeholder" class="circle--background__mobile" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_2_BackgroundMobile" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" style="background-color:#70b6bc;"/>
        <div class="circle--background" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_2_Background" style="background-color:#70b6bc;">
        </div>
        <img alt="Empower the poorest" class="mission-content__person mission-content__person--animation" src="/~/media/GFO/Home/article2person.png?h=801&amp;la=en&amp;w=404"/>
        <div class="mission-content__title--animation">
         <div class="mission-content__title-holder js-mission-content__title-holder">
          <h2 id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_2_HeaderTitlePart1">
           EMPOWER
           <br/>
           THE POOREST
          </h2>
          <h4 id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_2_HeaderTitlePart2" style="border-color:#70b6bc;">
           ESPECIALLY WOMEN AND GIRLS,
           <br/>
           TO TRANSFORM THEIR LIvES
          </h4>
         </div>
        </div>
        <img alt="Empower the poorest" class="mission-content__image mission-content__image--animation" src="/~/media/GFO/Home/article2.jpg?h=380&amp;la=en&amp;w=675"/>
        <div class="mission-content__description mission-content__description--animation">
         <h3>
          We believe
         </h3>
         <div class="divider divider--mission">
          <span class="divider__line--left" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_2_Divider1" style="border-color:#70b6bc;">
          </span>
          <span class="divider__arrow divider__arrow--up" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_2_Divider2" style="border-color:#70b6bc;">
          </span>
          <span class="divider__line--right" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_2_Divider3" style="border-color:#70b6bc;">
          </span>
         </div>
         <strong id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_2_Subtitle2Tag" style="color:#70b6bc;">
          that by giving people the tools to lead healthy, productive lives, we can help them lift themselves out of poverty.
         </strong>
         <p>
          Every year, millions of people find ways to transition out of poverty—by adopting new farming technologies, investing in new business opportunities, or finding new jobs. We know women and girls have a unique power to reshape societies. When you invest
 in a woman’s health and empowerment, it has a ripple effect, helping families, communities, and countries achieve long-lasting benefits.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="mission-content__navigation has-person">
         <strong id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_2_LinksHeaderTag" style="background-color:#70b6bc;">
          A closer look
         </strong>
         <ul class="mission-content__navigation-links">
          <li>
           <a class="link-text omni-link-tracker" href="/What-We-Do/Global-Growth-and-Opportunity/Financial-Services-for-the-Poor" omni-events="" omni-title="Content For: " omni-values="eVar16=" omni-vars="eVar16" target="_blank">

            Teach farmers how to increase production sustainably
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a class="link-text omni-link-tracker" href="/What-We-Do/Global-Development/Family-Planning" omni-events="" omni-title="Content For: " omni-values="eVar16=" omni-vars="eVar16" target="_blank">
            Help women make informed family-planning decisions
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a class="link-text omni-link-tracker" href="/What-We-Do/US-Program/Postsecondary-Success" omni-events="" omni-title="Content For: " omni-values="eVar16=" omni-vars="eVar16">
            Increase students' college completion rates
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </article>
      </section>
      <section class="mission">
       <article class="mission-content" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_3_MissionArticle">
        <img alt="Background placeholder" class="circle--background__mobile" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_3_BackgroundMobile" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" style="background-color:#9f8115;"/>
        <div class="circle--background" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_3_Background" style="background-color:#9f8115;">
        </div>
        <img alt="Combat infectious diseases that particularly affect the poorest" class="mission-content__person mission-content__person--animation" src="/~/media/GFO/Home/article3person.png?h=800&amp;la=en&amp;w=483"/>
        <div class="mission-content__title--animation">
         <div class="mission-content__title-holder js-mission-content__title-holder">
          <h2 id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_3_HeaderTitlePart1">
           Combat
           <br/>
           infectious
           <br/>
           Diseases
          </h2>
          <h4 id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_3_HeaderTitlePart2" style="border-color:#9f8115;">
           That particularly affect
           <br/>
           the poorest
          </h4>
         </div>
        </div>
        <img alt="Combat infectious diseases that particularly affect the poorest" class="mission-content__image mission-content__image--animation" src="/~/media/GFO/Home/article3.jpg?h=380&amp;la=en&amp;w=676"/>
        <div class="mission-content__description mission-content__description--animation">
         <h3>
          We believe
         </h3>
         <div class="divider divider--mission">
          <span class="divider__line--left" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_3_Divider1" style="border-color:#9f8115;">
          </span>
          <span class="divider__arrow divider__arrow--up" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_3_Divider2" style="border-color:#9f8115;">
          </span>
          <span class="divider__line--right" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_3_Divider3" style="border-color:#9f8115;">
          </span>
         </div>
         <strong id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_3_Subtitle2Tag" style="color:#9f8115;">
          we can save lives by delivering the latest in science and technology to those with the greatest needs.
         </strong>
         <p>
          We work with partners to provide effective vaccines, drugs, and diagnostics and to develop innovative approaches to deliver health services to those who need it most. And we invest heavily in developing new vaccines to prevent infectious diseases that
 impose the greatest burden.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="mission-content__navigation has-person">
         <strong id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_3_LinksHeaderTag" style="background-color:#9f8115;">
          A closer look
         </strong>
         <ul class="mission-content__navigation-links">
          <li>
           <a class="link-text omni-link-tracker" href="/What-We-Do/Global-Health/Malaria" omni-events="" omni-title="Content For: " omni-values="eVar16=" omni-vars="eVar16" target="_blank">

          </li>

      <section class="mission">
       <article class="mission-content mission-content--right" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_4_MissionArticle">
        <img alt="Background placeholder" class="circle--background__mobile" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_4_BackgroundMobile" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" style="background-color:#b8293d;"/>
        <div class="circle--background" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_4_Background" style="background-color:#b8293d;">
        </div>
        <img alt="Inspire people to take action to change the world" class="mission-content__person mission-content__person--animation" src="/~/media/GFO/Home/article4person.png?h=787&amp;la=en&amp;w=502"/>
        <div class="mission-content__title--animation">
         <div class="mission-content__title-holder js-mission-content__title-holder">
          <h2 id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_4_HeaderTitlePart1">
           INSPIRE PEOPLE
           <br/>
           TO TAKE ACTION
          </h2>
          <h4 id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_4_HeaderTitlePart2" style="border-color:#b8293d;">
           to CHANGE THE WORLD
          </h4>
         </div>
        </div>
        <img alt="" class="mission-content__image mission-content__image--animation" src="/~/media/GFO/Home/DE068721_1_676x380.jpg?h=380&amp;la=en&amp;w=676"/>
        <div class="mission-content__description mission-content__description--animation">
         <h3>
          We know
         </h3>
         <div class="divider divider--mission">
          <span class="divider__line--left" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_4_Divider1" style="border-color:#b8293d;">
          </span>
          <span class="divider__arrow divider__arrow--up" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_4_Divider2" style="border-color:#b8293d;">
          </span>
          <span class="divider__line--right" id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_4_Divider3" style="border-color:#b8293d;">
          </span>
         </div>
         <strong id="bodyregion_1_homepagecomponents_4_Subtitle2Tag" style="color:#b8293d;">
          our resources alone are not enough, so we work to change public policies, attitudes, and behaviors to improve lives.
         </strong>
         <p>
          We partner with governments and the public and private sectors, and foster greater public awareness of urgent global issues.
         </p>
